snippet.textDisplay:
I love this one most certainly and find it amazing but frankly I find one song better, and in fact I like far more than Still Alive...Cara Mia AKA The Turret Opera.
I knew the gameplay yet wasn't driven to play the game.
I knew the story, still wasn't driven.
Hearing that song, (and this)I had to beat the game that day which I did. One of my favorite endings ever.
snippet.textOriginal:
